attributes.action: Prosecute, remove from office and seek refund from any Member of Parliament who has been proved to be fraudulently claiming expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel an apology is insufficient to satisfy the vast majority of the british public given the extent of the alleged misuse of public funds in the form of mp's expenses claims

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
